Text.val: 19.10.2012 SCR17405 SHZ Removed workaround to change attribute of file which has to be copied from IFS to
Windows temp directory to CCSID1252
31.08.2012 LB Replace old CRTCSV functinality by native CPYTOIMPF
QSH is used in order to run the CL command in a separate job. CPYTOIMPF doesn't work with
other CLI functinality.
15.08.2012 SH SCR17405 Task "Build statement to create temp": Added Unicode support
09.05.2012 SH SCR17302 Added test on number of recored to fetch > GSET_QUANTITY(359) to skip the query
09.02.2011 SH SCR15765 Removed unused sourcecode
09.07.2010 SH SCR15567 Changed property of v-system to use proper model 300
16.03.2006 JJ SCR10477 Selective showing of columns
21.12.2004 JJ SCR7468 Added Conditional where clause handling
17.12.2004 JJ SCR7554 Added NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT for alpha fields in MGEXCEL2
because of added support for explicit (outer) joins
28.10.2004 JJ SCR7249 Fixed codepage handling csv conversion
14.10.2004 JJ SCR7114 Optimized version using AS400 for csv conversion
- colums for numerics with decimals created as CHAR
07.10.2004 JJ SCR6563 If stripping of decimal point from temp column names
29.07.2004 JJ Program now also returns the number of rows found
28.07.2004 JJ Dev version calls deve version of sub program(s)
19.01.2004 LB Result file extension (TXT) must be in Upper case. QDLS doesn't
support lower case.
14.03.2003 LB "NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT" is a must for numeric fields of
second temporary file
I don't know why it was removed however the entire consept can't work if I copy
DB2 file with nulls to steam file by CPYTOPCD command
23.01.2003 JJ fixed handling of numerics with decimals
29-AUG-2002 ASe: Removed "NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT" from the column lines in
+ create table stmt since this lead to SQL errors during execution of inserts
+ into the table created, here.
Compose filename
For AS400 remote command we need the temp file path in AS400 format
regardless of platform, so get both formats
Create SQL statement for select
-- Number of rows to select exceeded max number of allowed rows (50.000), so skip
further process
Delete previous result table (as400)
Create result table (as400)
Fill result table
Copy result table to pc (fixed position)
LB 31.08.2012 Replace CRTCSVSTMF by CPYTOIMPF
Copy temp DB Table to FLDTA
Call QSH with CPYTOIMPF
Rename Header
cat CSV content into Header
Delete tmp file with CSV content
Change rights
Delete Temporary FILE in FLDTA

ExpSyntax.val: 'CRTCSVSTMF SOURCE(QTEMP/MGEXCEL2) TARGET('''&Trim ({0,18})&''') COLHDG(*NONE) FLDDEL('';'') STRDEL('' '') RPLSTRDEL('' '') STMFOPT(*ADD) STMFCODPAG(*STMF)'

'QSH CMD(''system -q "CPYTOIMPF FROMFILE(FLDTA/MGEX'&Trim (MID ({0,8},1,6))&') TOSTMF('''''&Trim ({0,18})&'.body'''') STMFCODPAG('&Trim(Translate('%CPYTOIMPF_STMFCCSID%'))&') MBROPT(*ADD) RCDDLM(*CRLF) STRDLM(*NONE) RMVBLANK(*BOTH) FLDDLM('''';'''') DECPNT(*PERIOD)"'')'
'CRTDUPOBJ OBJ(MGEXCEL2) FROMLIB(QTEMP) OBJTYPE(*FILE) TOLIB(FLDTA) NEWOBJ(MGEX'&Trim (MID ({0,8},1,6))&') DATA(*YES)'

Text.val: Get column properties
Depending of the field type (alpha /unicode / num etc)
... alpha
... unicode
... date
logical/time fields are not supported
Number without decimal
Number with decimalc ast as character

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({1,15})&' '&'GRAPHIC ('&Trim ({0,7})&') CCSID 13488 NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT'&' '
Trim ({1,15})&' CHAR ('&Trim (Str (2+Val (StrToken ({0,7},1,','),''),''))&')'&' NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT '
Trim ({1,15})&' NUMERIC ('&Trim ({0,7})&')'&' NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT '

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QTEMP/MGEXCEL1 FOR READ ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS WITH NC
